    • Constructor Detail

      • Triangle

        public Triangle​(double l)
         throws BadSize
        Constructs Equaliteral Triangle object with given size. Default Position of Triangle is (0,0). As Default Triangle will be filled. As there is no rotating.
        Parameters:
        l - is length.
        Throws:
        BadSize - is thrown, when zero or negative value is given for size parameters.

      • Triangle

        public Triangle​(Triangle triangle)

      • Triangle

        public Triangle​(double l,
                double posx,
                double posy)
         throws BadSize
        Constructs Triangle object with given sizes.
        Parameters:
        l - is width.
        posx - is x coordinate.
        posy - is y coordinate.
        Throws:
        BadSize - is thrown when zero or negative value is given for size parameters.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Shape other)
        Compares this Triangle with the specified Triangle with respect to their areas.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Shape
        Parameters:
        The - Shape to be compared.
        Returns:
        A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this Triangle's area is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified Triangle.

      • setRotate

        public void setRotate​(boolean r)
        Sets the rotate flag of Triangle.
        Note:
        It can only be rotated around 180 degrees.
        Parameters:
        Rotate - , True for rotating this Triangle by 180 degrees around (x,y).
